short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts you when someone mentions your name during online meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say My Name - Your Personal Name Notifier

Have you ever been in a meeting or a crowded room and missed someone mentioning your name? Say My Name is here to help! This handy Chrome extension monitors web pages for occurrences of your name and notifies you instantly when someone mentions it. Stay alert and never miss an important conversation again.

Key Features:

Customizable name monitoring
Adjustable monitoring intervals
Real-time notifications
Easy-to-use interface
Stay connected and in the loop with Say My Name. Download the extension now and never miss a mention!
